text: Santa's workshop is the legendary workshop where Santa Claus makes the toys and presents given out at Christmas. The workshop is a sprawling commune located at the North Pole. The exact location of Santa's workshop varies, depending upon local culture. There are at least eight claimed locations for his workshop.www.emailsanta.com/santa-claus… For example, believers in Canada send letters to Santa's Workshop at his North Pole location in Canada with the unique postal code of "H0H 0H0".canadianstampnews.com/holiday-…. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Buildings and structures Category:Folklore Category:Christmas
title: Santa's workshop
